类 AbstractSearchFormController

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    com.interface21.context.ApplicationContextAware, com.interface21.web.servlet.mvc.Controller
    直接已知子类:
    FindOwnersForm

    public abstract class AbstractSearchFormController
extends com.interface21.web.servlet.mvc.SimpleFormController
    Form controller that should be subclassed to provide a search capability. In addition to the "formView" and "successView" properties supplied by SimpleFormController, it adds a "selectView" property. Subclasses must provide an implementation of the abstract "search" method that will return a List.

    If there are no validation errors, the view that is displayed will depend upon the number of elements in the returned List: 0 elements displays "formView", exactly 1 element diplays "successView", more than 1 element displays "selectView".

    作者:
    Ken Krebs

    • 构造器详细资料

      • AbstractSearchFormController

        public AbstractSearchFormController()
        Create a new instance of AbstractSearchFormController.

        Subclasses should set the following properties, either in the constructor or via a BeanFactory: formView, successView, selectView.

        另请参阅:
        SimpleFormController, SimpleFormController.setFormView(java.lang.String), SimpleFormController.setSuccessView(java.lang.String), setSelectView(java.lang.String)

      • onSubmit

        protected com.interface21.web.servlet.ModelAndView onSubmit(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                                            java.lang.Object command,
                                                            com.interface21.validation.BindException errors)
                                                     throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                                                            java.io.IOException
        This implementation processes the results of the "search" method, displaying the correct view depending upon the contents of the returned List. This should not normally need to be overridden.
        覆盖:
        onSubmit 在类中 com.interface21.web.servlet.mvc.SimpleFormController
        参数:
        request - current servlet request
        response - current servlet response
        command - form object with request parameters bound onto it
        errors - binder without errors (subclass can add errors if it wants to)
        返回:
        the prepared model and view
        抛出:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - in case of invalid state or arguments
        java.io.IOException - in case of I/O errors
        另请参阅:
        SimpleFormController.onSubmit(Object), SimpleFormController.showForm(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, com.interface21.validation.BindException)

      • search

        protected abstract java.util.List search(java.lang.Object command)
        Template callback method that subclasses must implement to perform the search.
        参数:
        command - object with embedded search information
        返回:
        the results in List form
